duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all aspects of the Stores' operations and leading the entire operation of the Store.
Recruits, trains and develops Associates and leadership team to deliver the desired sales and profit results.
Manages the operations of the Stockroom, Front End, and Sales Floor to ensure new merchandise gets to the sales floor in a timely manner.
Controls payroll hours to plan, as the primary controllable expense, as well as adjusting to current business trends.
Maintains adherence to Company safety policies and ensures the safety of Associates and Customers.
Leads all Store Associates in, and models, a professional appearance, in accordance with the Company Dress Code.
Ensures recovery, sizing, and markdowns are completed to Company standards.
Responsible for training Associates on Loss Prevention programs to achieve Store shortage goals.
Leads the annual inventory process including preparation and execution of inventory guidelines.
Ensures compliance with all State, Local and Federal regulations.

education_certification.credential: Five or more years of Store management experience in a retail environment.
